source.784f7202:
sum_squared_errors = []
k_range = range(1,10)
for k in k_range:
    km = KMeans(n_clusters=k)
    km.fit(df)
    sum_squared_errors.append(km.inertia_)
source.ef37d2bc:
plt.xlabel('K')
plt.ylabel('Sum of squared errors')
plt.plot(k_range,sum_squared_errors)
source.60677beb: ***Solution: The point at which the elbow shape is created is 3, that is, our K value or an optimal number of clusters is 3.***
